title: BTC PUMPED TO OUR LEVEL EXACTLY!!! HERE'S WHAT'S NEXT!!

chunks.text: Hey guys, it's Jordan here from Coinb Trading. Just a quick update on the Bitcoin price action charts. If you're new to the channel, subscribe and let's get into it. Make sure you are taking advantage of our week's deposit bonus campaign using this QR code. For those of you who have been following my videos will remember that in this video one week ago. I did give the upper level of the PC of the larger range that we have just hit to the dollar that we are actually bouncing from our value area low up towards the point of control of this larger range. This is a reminder for us just how important these points of controls are and especially how important it is to always be aware of the larger range and where these high volume nodes are sitting. For those of you who missed it, all we did was take the fixed range volume profile using all of the information of the current larger range, drop it in, and as you can see, the point of control was tapped absolutely to the dollar. And this is not magic. This is not voodoo. This is simply price action and volume analysis on the charts. Also very important to note here was this other high volume node on the larger range PC which as we can see was exactly the level that Bitcoin needed to break to have its nice pump up to that larger range PC. We did get the pump because of the lower inflation numbers that came out and very nice to see the fundamental news analysis playing into our technical analysis and giving us such nice trades. For those of you who managed to catch my interview on the Moon Show last week will remember when I was talking about this golden pocket entry zone that I was eyeing. And as we can see, this trade actually tapped the entry perfectly right in the middle of the golden pocket. And we managed to get a very nice 8% up on spot from that level. That was very simply just identifying a completed trend and then taking our fib retracement from the top of the trend to the bottom. Now that we are back in value area high of our current micro range, many are looking to the ascending triangle pattern that is very visible with our lower upward sloping support trend line and our flat horizontal trend line. As we can see, this does look like a breakout. And now we need to watch to see if this level does get retested as a support and resistance flip. Dropping our fixed range volume profile back in on this micro range. We can see a very important high volume node here at 92K to be very aware of as well as our POC now sitting at 91K and this very high volume node level sitting at 90K. For me, this entire zone should be the very important zone that we are keeping our eyes on now to see if we really can flip that liquidity into support. We can see very very strong resistance here. Now broken, but no real retest after the break. This could be a nice zone to look for longs if we are going to continue our new upwards sloping market structure to the upside. A really nice indicator to use now to give us info on what's happening is the market cipher B.
